column1: #Text=2008 USL First Division : Seattle Sounders vs. Vancouver Whitecaps

#Text=May 23 , 200820:00 ( PST ) Seattle Sounders 2 – 0 Vancouver Whitecaps Swangard Stadium , Vancouver , British Columbia , Canada Attendance : 5,146 Gardner 3'(2)Le Toux 8'(3)Scott 24'Cascio 90 ' Match Report 39 ' Addlery 72 ' Arze
#Text=Vancouver Whitecaps lost their 2nd game of the season after losing 2-0 to Seattle Sounders on last night .
#Text=Seattle effectively took control of the Interstate 5 derby after early goals from Josh Gardner and Sebastien Le Toux .
#Text=Whitecaps fans were left in shock after only 7 minutes , as Seattle " blitzed " the home-side with two quick goals in the opening exchanges .

#Text=It took just 3 minutes for the Sounders to score the opening goal , as Gardner got on the end of a Le Toux through ball before hitting the shot past a diving Whitecaps goalkeeper Srdjan Djekanovic to give the Seattle the lead .
#Text=Seattle extended their lead through the reigning Player of the Year in Le Toux on 7th minutes with a right-footed shot that went past the diving Whitecaps goalkeeper Srdjan Djekanovic .
#Text=Whitecaps centre back Omar Jarun underlined the disappointment of his team 's start .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The first few minutes were an absolute disaster from us defensively ,  he told whitecapsfc.com .
